name: Serpa Cloud, Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud deployment platform designed to automate cloud deployment for developers. The company offers a graphical interface, automated deployment, and support for cloud providers, enabling developers to deploy code to the cloud reducing costs and accelerating time to market.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud deployment platform designed to automate cloud deployment for developers. The company offers a graphical interface, automated deployment, and support for cloud providers, enabling developers to deploy code to the cloud reducing costs and accelerating time to market.
